successes.title: Burgle Bros. - A Cooperative Heist Boardgame
successes.description: Burgle Bros is a cooperative heist boardgame where players use unique powers to avoid guards, navigate alarms and get out!

Pledges.description: Print and play files for making your own copy to try out. These are the beta cards - doesn't include final art.
One copy of Burgle Bros. with all stretch goals.  Add up to 2 copies for $29 each.
One copy of Burgle Bros. with all stretch goals AND a digital copy of Monaco(delivered in April)   Add up to 2 copies of Burgle Bros for $29 each.
Four copies of Burgle Bros. with all stretch goals.
10 copies of Burgle Bros. with all stretch goals.
